  • Method Details

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver​(LambdaObserver observer, java.util.function.BiConsumer<LambdaObserver,​T> lambda)
      This method can be used to register an observer on the current object
      Parameters:
      observer - the observer to be registered

    • removeObserver

      public void removeObserver​(LambdaObserver observer)
      This method can be used to de-register an observer from the current object
      Parameters:
      observer - the observer to be de-registered

    • notify

      protected void notify​(T message)
      This method is called when the Observable changes state and needs to update its Observers.
      Parameters:
      message - the message that is sent to all observers

    • notify

      protected void notify​(T message, boolean requireAtLeastOneObserver)
      This method is called when the Observable changes state and needs to update its Observers.
      Parameters:
      message - the message that is sent to all observers
      requireAtLeastOneObserver - if true, puts the current thread in wait until at least one observer is present
